Zf9z9gKZXSAb6FII.name: Accuracy Bonus

activation.reactionTrigger: When you make a weapon attack

Zf9z9gKZXSAb6FII.description:
When you make a weapon attack, you can use your reaction to gain an attack bonus or damage bonus as shown on the Accuracy Bonus table. Between long rests, you have a number of uses equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).

+1 hit or +1d6 (1 use)

+2 hit or +3d6 damage (2 uses)

+3 hit or +5d6 damage (3 uses)

J08ivjrcndNIQqr1.name: Accuracy Reserve
J08ivjrcndNIQqr1.description: If you have not moved since the beginning of your last turn, you gain a +1 bonus to weapon attack rolls until the end of your turn. You lose this bonus if you move.

system.description: At 2nd level, you learn to maintain a level of discipline that spills over into everything you do. This perpetual state of focus allows you to perform incredible feats. When using Trained Accuracy, the bonus to attack rolls from Fighting Style: Archery becomes a +2 bonus to damage on ranged weapon attacks.
